mapper.insert: insert into student (name, username, password, avatar, sex, code, role) values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{avatar}, #{sex}, #{code}, #{role})
mapper.update: update student set name=#{name}, username=#{username}, password=#{password}, avatar=#{avatar}, sex=#{sex}, code=#{code}, role=#{role} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from student
and name like concat ('%',#{name},'%')
order by id desc
